He takes her up and declines his head upon her neck. He lies him down upon a bank of flowers. She, seeing him asleep, leaves him. Anon come in another man, takes off his crown, kisses it, pours poison in the sleeper's ears, and leaves him. The Queen returns, finds the King dead, makes passionate action. The pois'ner with some three or four mutes come in again, seem to condole with her. The dead body is carried away. The King takes place under the cloth of state; the two Cardinals sit under him as judges. The Queen takes place some distance from the King. The Bishops place themselves on each side the court, in manner of a consistory; below them, the Scribes. The Lords sit next the Bishops. sd: Drum beats. Exeunt Alcibiades, Phrynia, and Timandra.

title: Timon of Athens
sd: Enter the Steward Flavius to Timon.

title: Timon of Athens
sd: Enter Poet and Painter; Timon watching them from his cave.

title: Timon of Athens
sd: Exeunt both, driven out by Timon, who retires to his cave.

title: Timon of Athens
sd: Enter Steward Flavius and two Senators.

title: Timon of Athens
sd: Enter Timon out of his cave.

title: Timon of Athens
sd: Enter two other Senators with a Messenger.

title: Timon of Athens
sd: Enter a Soldier in the woods, seeking Timon. A rude tomb seen.

title: Timon of Athens
sd: Trumpets sound. Enter Alcibiades with his powers before Athens.

title: Timon of Athens
sd: The Senators appear upon the walls.

title: Timon of Athens
sd: The Senators descend and open the gates.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter the Tribunes, among them Marcus Andronicus, and Senators aloft, and then enter, below, Saturninus and his followers at one door, and Bassianus and his followers at the other, with Drums and Trumpets.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Flourish. They go up into the Senate-house.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Sound drums and trumpets, and then enter two of Titus' sons Martius and Mutius; and then two Men bearing a coffin covered with black; then two other sons, Lucius and Quintus. Then Titus Andronicus; and then Tamora, the Queen of Goths, and her three sons Alarbus, Chiron, and Demetrius; with Aaron the Moor, and others as many as can be.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Then set down the coffin, and Titus speaks.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter the sons of Andronicus (Lucius, Quintus, Martius, and Mutius) again with their swords bloody.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Sound trumpets, and lay the coffin in the tomb.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Marcus Andronicus, attended by the other Tribunes, with Saturninus and Bassianus, speaks from above.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: A long flourish till they come down.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Flourish. Saturninus courts Tamora in dumb show.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Exeunt Bassianus and Marcus with Lavinia.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: During the fray, exeunt Saturninus, Tamora, Demetrius, Chiron, and Aaron.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter aloft the Emperor with Tamora and her two sons, Demetrius and Chiron, and Aaron the Moor.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Marcus and Titus' sons Lucius, Quintus, and Martius.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: The brother and the sons kneel.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: They put him in the tomb.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: All but Marcus and Titus stand aside.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Flourish. Enter the Emperor, Tamora and her two sons, Demetrius and Chiron, with the Moor Aaron, at one door; enter, at the other door, Bassianus and Lavinia with others.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Marcus, Lavinia, and Titus' sons kneel.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Exeunt. Sound trumpets. Manet Moor Aaron.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Titus Andronicus and his three sons (Lucius, Quintus, and Martius), making a noise with hounds and horns, and Marcus.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Here a cry of hounds, and wind horns in a peal.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Then enter Saturninus, Tamora, Bassianus, Lavinia, Chiron, Demetrius, and their Attendants.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Aaron alone with a bag of gold.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Tamora alone to the Moor.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Demetrius throws the body of Bassianus into the pit; then exeunt Demetrius and Chiron dragging off Lavinia.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Aaron with two of Titus' sons, Quintus and Martius.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter the Emperor and Aaron the Moor.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Tamora with Attendants, Titus Andronicus, and Lucius.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter the Empress' sons (Demetrius and Chiron) with Lavinia, her hands cut off, and her tongue cut out, and ravished.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Wind horns. Enter Marcus from hunting.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter the Judges and Senators and Tribunes, with Titus' two sons Martius and Quintus bound, passing on the stage to the place of execution, and Titus going before, pleading.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: The Judges, etc. pass by him and exeunt with the prisoners.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Lucius with his weapon drawn.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter a Messenger, with two heads and a hand.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Titus Andronicus, Marcus, Lavinia, and the boy, young Lucius.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Marcus strikes the dish with a knife.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Lucius' Son, and Lavinia running after him, and the boy flies from her, with his books under his arm. Enter Titus and Marcus.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Lavinia turns over with her stumps the books which Lucius has let fall.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: He writes his name with his staff, and guides it with feet and mouth.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: She takes the staff in her mouth, and guides it with her stumps, and writes.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Aaron, Chiron, and Demetrius at one door; and at the other door Young Lucius and another with a bundle of weapons, and verses writ upon them.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Nurse with a blackamoor child.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Takes the child from the Nurse, and draws.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Exeunt Demetrius and Chiron, bearing off the Nurse's body.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Titus, old Marcus, young Lucius, and other gentlemen (Publius, Sempronius, Caius) with bows; and Titus bears the arrows with letters on the ends of them.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter the Clown with a basket, and two pigeons in it.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Emperor and Empress and her two sons (Demetrius and Chiron), Lords, and others; the Emperor brings the arrow in his hand that Titus shot at him.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Flourish. Enter Lucius with an army of Goths, with Drums and Soldiers.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter a Goth leading of Aaron with his child in his arms.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: A ladder brought, which Aaron is made to ascend.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Tamora and her two sons, Demetrius and Chiron, disguised.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: They knock, and Titus above opens his study door.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Exit Titus. Publius, etc., lay hold on Chiron and Demetrius.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Titus Andronicus with a knife and Lavinia with a basin.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Lucius, Marcus, and the Goths with Aaron prisoner, and his child in the arms of an Attendant.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Exeunt Goths with Aaron. Sound trumpets within.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Enter Emperor and Empress with Aemilius, Tribunes, Senators, and others.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: A table brought in. The company sit down.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Trumpets sounding, enter Titus like a cook, placing the dishes, and Lavinia with a veil over her face, young Lucius, and others.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Exeunt Lucius, Marcus, Aemilius, and others and enter above.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Pointing to Aaron's child in the arms of an Attendant.

title: Titus Andronicus
sd: Lucius, Marcus, Aemilius, and the others descend.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Cressida and her man Alexander.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Aeneas and passes over the stage.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Antenor and passes over the stage.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Hector and passes over the stage.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Paris and passes over the stage.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Helenus and passes over the stage.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Troilus and passes over the stage.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Trojan Soldiers and pass over the stage.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Sennet. Enter Agamemnon, Nestor, Ulysses, Diomedes, Menelaus, with others.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Priam, Hector, Troilus, Paris, and Helenus.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Cassandra raving with her hair about her ears.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Agamemnon, Ulysses, Nestor, Diomedes, Ajax, and Calchas.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Music sounds within. Enter Pandarus and Paris's Servant.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Ulysses, Diomedes, Nestor, Agamemnon, Ajax, Menelaus, and Calchas. Flourish.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Achilles and Patroclus and stand in the door of their tent.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter at one door Aeneas with a torch; at another, Paris, Deiphobus, Antenor, Diomedes the Grecian, and others with torches.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Paris, Troilus, Aeneas, Deiphobus, Antenor, Diomedes.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Aeneas, Paris, Antenor, Deiphobus, and Diomedes.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Exeunt Troilus, Cressida, and Diomedes. Sound trumpet.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Ajax armed, Achilles, Patroclus, Agamemnon, Menelaus, Ulysses, Nestor, Greek Trumpeter, etc.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter all of Troy: Hector armed, Paris, Aeneas, Helenus, Troilus, and Attendants.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Ajax and Hector enter the lists.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Agamemnon and the rest come forward.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Exeunt all but Troilus and Ulysses.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Agamemnon, Hector, Troilus, Ajax, Ulysses, Nestor, Menelaus, and Diomedes, with lights.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Exit Diomedes, Ulysses and Troilus following.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Exeunt Achilles, Hector, Ajax, and Nestor.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Troilus and Ulysses at a distance; after them, Thersites.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Exeunt severally Priam and Hector. Alarum.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter a Greek Knight in armor.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Enter Thersites; Menelaus and Paris fighting.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Puts off his helmet and hangs his shield behind him.

title: Troilus and Cressida
sd: Sound retreat. Shout. Enter Agamemnon, Ajax, Menelaus, Nestor, Diomedes, and the rest, marching.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Orsino, Duke of Illyria, Curio, and other Lords; Musicians attending.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Viola, a Captain, and Sailors.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Sir Toby Belch and Maria.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Valentine, and Viola in man's attire.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Lady Olivia with Malvolio and Attendants.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Viola and Malvolio at several doors.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Sir Toby and Sir Andrew.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Duke, Viola, Curio, and others.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Sir Toby, Sir Andrew, and Fabian.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Viola, and Clown with a tabor.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Exeunt all but Olivia and Viola.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Sir Toby, Sir Andrew, and Fabian.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Exeunt Sir Toby, Fabian, and Maria.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Steps aside to avoid the Officers.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Breaks away and draws his sword.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Exeunt Sir Toby, Sir Andrew, and Fabian.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Duke, Viola, Curio, and Lords.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Exeunt Clown, Fabian, Sir Toby, and Sir Andrew.

title: Twelfth Night
sd: Enter Clown with a letter, and Fabian.

title: Two Gentlemen of Verona
sd: Speed nods, and Proteus looks at him questioningly.

title: Two Gentlemen of Verona
sd: Enter Valentine, Speed, and certain Outlaws.

title: Two Gentlemen of Verona
sd: Enter at one side Host, Julia in boy's clothes, as Sebastian.

title: Two Gentlemen of Verona
sd: Enter Silvia above at her window.

title: Two Gentlemen of Verona
sd: Enter Silvia above at her window.

title: Two Gentlemen of Verona
sd: Enter Proteus, Julia disguised as Sebastian.

title: Two Gentlemen of Verona
sd: Enter Thurio, Proteus, Julia disguised as Sebastian.

title: Two Gentlemen of Verona
sd: Enter Proteus, Silvia, Julia disguised as Sebastian.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Hymen with a torch burning; a Boy, in a white robe, before, singing and strewing flow'rs; after Hymen, a Nymph, encompass'd in her tresses, bearing a wheaten garland; then Theseus, between two other Nymphs with wheaten chaplets an their heads; then Hippolyta, the bride, led by Pirithous, and another holding a garland over her head (her tresses likewise hanging; after her, Emilia, holding up her train; Artesius and Attendants.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Music. The Song by the Boy.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter three Queens, in black, with veils stain'd, with imperial crowns.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: The first Queen falls down at the foot of Theseus; the second falls down at the foot of Hippolyta; the third before Emilia.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Cornets. A battle strook within; then a retreat; flourish.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Then enter Theseus, victor, with his Lords.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: The three Queens meet him and fall on their faces before him.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Herald with Attendants bearing Palamon and Arcite on two hearses.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Flourish. Exeunt, Attendants bearing Palamon and Arcite.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Music. Enter the Queens with the hearses of their Knights in a funeral solemnity, etc.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Palamon, and Arcite in prison.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Emilia and her Woman below.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter four Country People, and one with a garland before them.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: This short flourish of cornets, and shouts within. Enter Theseus, Hippolyta, Pirithous, Emilia, Arcite disguised, with a garland, etc.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Cornets in sundry places. Noise and hallowing, as people a-Maying.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Palamon, as out of a bush, with his shackles; bends his fist at Arcite.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Arcite with meat, wine, and files.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter a Schoolmaster Gerrold, four Countrymen as morris-dancers and another as the Bavian, five Wenches (Nell, Friz, Maudline, Luce and Barbary), with a Taborer.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Theseus, Pirithous, Hippolyta, Emilia, Arcite, and Train.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Exeunt Theseus and his company. Wind horns.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Arcite with armors and swords.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: They bow several ways; then advance and stand.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Theseus, Hippolyta, Emilia, Pirithous, and Train.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Jailer's Brother, Daughter, and others.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Emilia alone, with two pictures.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Theseus, Hippolyta, Pirithous, and Attendants.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Three altars erected--to Mars, Venus, and Diana. Flourish. Enter Theseus, Pirithous, Hippolyta, Attendants.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Flourish of cornets. Enter Palamon and Arcite and their Knights.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: They advance to the altar of Mars and fall on their faces; then kneel.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Here they fall on their faces as formerly, and there is heard clanging of armor, with a short thunder, as the burst of a battle, whereupon they all rise and bow to the altar.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Palamon and his Knights, with the former observance.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Here they advance to the altar of Venus, and fall on their faces; then kneel, as formerly.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Here music is heard; doves are seen to flutter. They fall again upon their faces, then on their knees.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Still music of records. Enter Emilia in white, her hair about her shoulders, and wearing a wheaten wreath; one in white holding up her train, her hair stuck with flowers; one before her carrying a silver hind, in which is convey'd incense and sweet odors, which being set upon the altar of Diana, her maids standing aloof, she sets fire to it; then they curtsy and kneel.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Here the hind vanishes under the altar, and in the place ascends a rose tree, having one rose upon it.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Here is heard a sudden twang of instruments, and the rose falls from the tree, which vanishes under the altar.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Doctor, Jailer, and Wooer in habit of Palamon.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Flourish. Enter Theseus, Hippolyta, Emilia, Pirithous, and some Attendants.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Cornets. Trumpets sound as to a charge.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Cornets. A great cry and noise within, crying "A Palamon!"

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Shout and cornets. Crying "A Palamon!" within.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Another cry, and shout within, and cornets.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Cornets. A great shout and cry, "Arcite! Victory!"

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Theseus, Hippolyta, Pirithous, Arcite as victor, and Attendants, etc.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: A block ready. Enter Palamon and his Knights pinion'd, Jailer, Executioner, etc., Guard.

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: A great noise within crying "Run! Save! Hold!"

title: Two Noble Kinsmen
sd: Enter Theseus, Hippolyta, Emilia, Arcite in a chair.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Enter Leontes, Hermione, Mamillius, Polixenes, Camillo, and Attendants.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Enter Leontes, Antigonus, Lords, and others.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Enter Paulina, a Gentleman, and Attendants.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Enter Leontes; Servants keeping the door.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Enter Paulina with a child; Antigonus and Lords endeavoring to hold her back.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Enter Hermione (as to her trial), Paulina, and Ladies attending.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Exeunt Paulina and Ladies with Hermione.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Enter Antigonus and a Mariner with the babe.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Laying down the child, with a scroll.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Enter Shepherd, Clown, Polixenes and Camillo disguised, Mopsa, Dorcas, Servants.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Here a dance of Shepherds and Shepherdesses.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Enter Servant of the Old Shepherd.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Exit Servant of the Old Shepherd.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Here a dance of twelve Satyrs.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Camillo, Florizel, and Perdita come forward.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Enter Leontes, Cleomines, Dion, Paulina, Servants.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Enter Florizel, Perdita, Cleomines, and others.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Enter Leontes, Polixenes, Florizel, Perdita, Camillo, Paulina, Lords, etc.

title: Winter's Tale
sd: Paulina draws a curtain, and discovers Hermione standing like a statue.
